title: The Complete Lensman Series (Illustrated): 7 Books Including Triplanetary, First Lensman, Galactic Patrol, Gray Lensman, Second Stage Lensman, Children of the Lens & Masters of the Vortex
description: Finally, a complete collection of novels from the Lensman series, a selection of classic science fiction novels written by American author Edward Elmer "Doc" Smith.This collection includes all 7 novels related to the Lensman TriplanetaryFirst LensmanGalactic PatrolGray LensmanSecond Stage LensmanChildren of the LensMasters of the Vortex (Aka The Vortex Blaster)This version also includes a selection of original astronomical images throughout the collection.
author: E.E. "Doc" Smith
